messages.messageBody:
hmmm...now that you mention it, I did forget to draw his pipe...rofl... he looks sensitive because there's supposed to be a woman next to him XD XD XD ( but sadly she turns out to be a Choshuu spy... T__T) ... draw a romantic/sexy pic of who? *wondering if sec likes yaoi...hmmm*


secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:The Hijikata pic is very interesting because
1) Hijikata is not looking at the audience
2) Hijikata does not have his pipe
both of the above mentioned factors make him look quiet appealing and
unintimidating...in fact he looks sensitive.
Perhaps, his signature PMK glare and pipe are the 2 things which make
him look older and more authoritative...without them he looks like
like a "pretty boy" LOL! (^_^)
I like the detail in the hair and neck.
As always outstanding work...if you would like them posted at
http://www.shinsengumihq.com please email the person in charge.

Your Loyal Retainer,
secretarytocapt3

messages.subject: Re: Hijikata's Pic!!!!!!!! ^^
messages.msgSnippet: The Hijikata pic is very interesting because 1) Hijikata is not looking at the audience 2) Hijikata does not have his pipe both of the above mentioned factors
messages.messageBody:
The Hijikata pic is very interesting because
1) Hijikata is not looking at the audience
2) Hijikata does not have his pipe
both of the above mentioned factors make him look quiet appealing and
unintimidating...in fact he looks sensitive.
Perhaps, his signature PMK glare and pipe are the 2 things which make
him look older and more authoritative...without them he looks like
like a "pretty boy" LOL! (^_^)
I like the detail in the hair and neck.
As always outstanding work...if you would like them posted at
http://www.shinsengumihq.com please email the person in charge.

Your Loyal Retainer,
secretarytocapt3

challenging anyone to draw a romantic/sexy pic

messages.subject: Hijikata's Pic!!!!!!!! ^^
messages.msgSnippet: Hi ppls! All this talk on Hijikata inspired me to finally draw his portrait... XD XD XD it s been a while since i had time to draw anything *sighs* well, hope
messages.messageBody:
Hi ppls! All this talk on Hijikata inspired me to finally draw his
portrait... XD XD XD it's been a while since i had time to draw
anything *sighs* well, hope you guys like it... and Phil (or whoever
said it ^^;;;, sorry bad memory) Kondou-kun's is coming up next! XD

~SaitohWorship~

PS.: Please comment on this one too! ^^ I really appreciated the
messages you left me last time^^
